body: Can you provide the stack trace of the error you are seeing from the crash dialog?
Yeah, you should've got an email. If I can be of any further help, don't hesitate to contact me.

Just going to paste the crashing thread trace here:

```
Crashed Thread:  0  CrBrowserMain  Dispatch queue: com.apple.main-thread

Exception Type:  EXC_BAD_ACCESS (SIGSEGV)
Exception Codes: KERN_INVALID_ADDRESS at 0x0000000000000000

VM Regions Near 0:
--> 
   __TEXT                 0000000102020000-0000000102021000 [    4K] r-x/rwx SM=COW  /Users/USER/Downloads/*/Atom.app/Contents/MacOS/Atom

Thread 0 Crashed:: CrBrowserMain  Dispatch queue: com.apple.main-thread
0   com.github.AtomFramework        0x0000000102047781 -[AtomNSWindowDelegate windowDidResignMain:] + 79
1   com.apple.CoreFoundation        0x00007fff8dce1e0c __CFNOTIFICATIONCENTER_IS_CALLING_OUT_TO_AN_OBSERVER__ + 12

11  com.apple.Foundation            0x00007fff8694fcb7 __NSFireDelayedPerform + 333
12  com.apple.CoreFoundation        0x00007fff8dc7a3e4 __CFRUNLOOP_IS_CALLING_OUT_TO_A_TIMER_CALLBACK_FUNCTION__ + 20
13  com.apple.CoreFoundation        0x00007fff8dc79f1f __CFRunLoopDoTimer + 1151
14  com.apple.CoreFoundation        0x00007fff8dceb5aa __CFRunLoopDoTimers + 298

22  com.apple.AppKit                0x00007fff8a6c499c -[NSApplication run] + 553
23  libchromiumcontent.dylib        0x0000000102780271 0x102763000 + 119409
```

Your stack looks similar to the one I'm seeing over at https://github.com/atom/atom/issues/3076 so I'm going to close that one out as a dupe of this one.
